item.title: Orica STEM partnership reaches 500th high school
item.description: With support from Orica, Victoria University Secondary College (VUSC) in Deer Park, Melbourne became the 500th high school to enrol in STELR, the Science and Technology Education Leveraging Relevance project.

item.title: Orica voted Top 100 Graduate Employer for second consecutive year
item.description: Orica confirmed its place as one of Australiaâ€™s leading graduate employers when the Top 100 Graduate Employers were announced in Sydney on Thursday 4 February, 2016.

item.title: Orica chooses NorthgateArinso for global HR services in the cloud
item.description: NorthgateArinso (NGA), the leading global HR service provider, has been appointed by global mining services company, Orica, to deliver HR services supporting the entire employee life-cycle of its 15000 employees in over 50 countries.

item.title: December 2015 Community Update
item.description: Orica wishes you a safe and happy festive season.
